attributes.action: offer crystal clear proof CO2 is a valid basis for taxation in a personal letter to every household
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is unfair to expect the Prime Minister to dispell or prove CO2 vs Climate change but evidence of using the theory as a basis for taxation is something I would personally welcome.  Currently it has all the merit of the now defunct window tax amongst those intelligent enough to challenge the theory and yet these individuals are ridiculed by the uneducated masses fed disinformation by the media
